name: The Tales of Redbox: An Escape From Desire
name_original: The Tales of Redbox: An Escape From Desire
description:
The Tales of Redbox: An Escape From Desire is an Arcade / Shooter designed to test your agility, precision, and strategy. Battle your way through the Minions of Chaos to come face-to-face with that which you desire most, Bluebox.

Control the protagonist Redbox using your mouse cursor enabling you to quickly dodge obstacles and take aim at the Minions of Chaos. Destroy as many minions as possible to improve your high score before confronting Bluebox in the final battle.

The game is currently in alpha stage production and has one playable level, but do not be fooled. The level increases in difficulty and only the most skilled players will be able to continue destroying minions while dodging the moving obstacles.

The alpha is free, but if you enjoyed the game, any show of financial support will go towards helping a Moroccan Non-Profit organization, Azrou Tahaddi Association: For Children with Special Needs, pay the import tax on a passenger van that was donated to the organization and will enable them to help transport the nearly 40 adults and children in their care to and from school and work. I do this in an attempt to give gamers the ability to impact the progress of humanity.

Are you up for the challenge?
